name: CACore
title: Canadian Core
description: provides basic interoperability expectations for human-patient systems in the Canadian space.  Modeled after the US-Core implementation guide

grouping.name: Profiles
grouping.description: Constraints on FHIR resources to be adhered to as part of the CA-Core implementation guide

grouping.name: Extensions
grouping.description: Extensions defined as part of the CA-Core implementation guide

grouping.name: Terminology
grouping.description: ValueSets (and Code Systems) defined for use within the CA-Core implementation guide

resource.name: Birth Sex
resource.description: A code classifying the person's sex assigned at birth. Replicates the birthsex extension in US-Core-R4 for interoperability.

resource.name: ServiceLanguage
resource.description: Indentifies languages that that services are provided in.

resource.name: Date Estimated Flag
resource.description: If true, indicates that information entered is an estimate and may not be precise

resource.name: Identifier Version
resource.description: A version string indicating the currency/validity of an identifier

resource.name: AllergyIntolerance Profile
resource.description: Proposed constraints and extensions on the AllergyIntolerance Resource.  Generated as a first step toward creating a set of Canadian Core FHIR profiles.

resource.description: Proposed constraints and extensions on the Condition Resource.  Generated as a first step toward creating a set of Canadian Core FHIR profiles.

resource.name: Birth Sex
resource.description: Codes for documenting sex at birth. (Replicates the birthsex ValueSet in US-Core-R4 for interoperability.)

resource.name: Health Concern Codes
resource.description: Clinical problems, conditions, diagnoses, symptoms, findings and complaints, as interpreted by the provider.

resource.name: Prescription Drug Form
resource.description: The list of forms in which compounded drugs or active ingredients can be dispensed to the patient.

resource.name: Prescription Medicinal Product
resource.description: The list of commonly used Medicinal products used for prescribing and dispensing in Canada.

resource.name: Vaccine Codes
resource.description: **Placeholder**\nCurrent and historical vaccines are published as separate lists by Canada Health Infoway.
